name: Line by Line
description:
A young boy poetically traverses the world before him in exploration of what lies beyond the city he has grown to call home, in search of something more than the smog and streets that populate his everyday life.

Use WASD to traverse the monochromatic environments that stand before you. Use W to jump, and D to drop below certain platforms.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ryan Normand - Environmental and Character Artist, Rigger and Animator

Noah Lemaire - Level Designer, Sound Designer and Narrative Designer

Nicholas Johnson - Engineer and Programmer

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

A project of 2D Game Development at Fitchburg State University
